benchmark_details.name: SalesBot 2.0 (A Human-Like Intent-Guided Chit-Chat Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: SalesBot 2.0 is a revised version of the SalesBot dataset, aiming to improve the naturalness and consistency of chit-chat dialogues by leveraging large language models. It includes intent-guided transitions and is designed to serve both academic research and commercial applications.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Enhance conversational agents by providing a dataset with improved naturalness and consistency in dialogue, facilitating smoother transitions between chit-chat and task-oriented dialogues.

data.source: Generated through the use of OpenAIâ€™s gpt-3.5-turbo API.
data.annotation: Annotated by LLMs to enhance dialogue quality and intent detection.

methodology.calculation: Scores based on continuous scale evaluation of dialogue quality.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score on naturalness indicates a more human-like dialogue, while consistency measures the coherence throughout the conversation.
